mod.description:
Requires UPE (Universal Property Enhancer). This allows it to not conflict with other mods.
Wildlife Enclosure Tweaks increases the total capacity of Zoo / Sanctuary Planets to a much higher value, allowing you to store more creatures there

component.description: Default version of the mod. Increases the Sanctuary Limit from 30 to 99
Extended version of the mod. Increases the Sanctuary Limit from 30 to 999, may cause lag on worlds with tons of creatures.
